com.ihealth.communication.control

Class Bg1Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.Bg1Control
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.ihealth.androidbg.audio.BG1.BG1_Command_Interface

    public class Bg1Control
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.ihealth.androidbg.audio.BG1.BG1_Command_Interface
    Public API for the BG1

    The class provides methods to control BG1 device. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to use a BG1 device, you need to callconnect() to connect the device when you get the OS Action Intent.ACTION_HEADSET_PLUG (headset in) firstly, and then callsendCode(String)to send code to the device, after that you can take measurement with the device.

      • getBottleInfoFromQR

        public static java.lang.String getBottleInfoFromQR(java.lang.String QRCode)
        Parse bottle Info of the QRCode
        Parameters:
        QRCode - the QRCode of scan
        Returns:
        jsonString like {"bottleInfo":[{"bottleId":"18882266","overDate":"2015-06-26","stripNum":"25"}]}

      • init

        public void init(android.content.Context context,
                 java.lang.String userName,
                 int filter)

        Parameters:

        userName - UserName
        filter - 0

      • init

        public void init(android.content.Context context,
                 java.lang.String userName,
                 int filter,
                 boolean showUI)
        Init the controller.
        Parameters:
        context - Context.
        userName - UserName
        filter - 0
        showUI - Whether show a toast when modify system volume.

        If true,some device may show a system toast to let the user know "Listening at high volume for long periods(Continuing to increase the volume) may damage your hearing." and then let user choose "OK" to have a better experience with iHealth Align.

        value true is recommended to have a better iHealth Align compatibility.

      • connect

        public void connect()
        Connect bg1 device
        • The action of the callback is Bg1Profile.ACTION_BG1_CONNECT_RESULT, the keys of message will show in the KeyList of action.

      • sendCode

        @Deprecated
public void sendCode(java.lang.String QRCode)
        Deprecated. 
        Send code to bg1 device, this function is only for god strip and blood measure. If you need more performance, please see sendCode(String, int, int)
        • The action of the callback is Bg1Profile.ACTION_BG1_SENDCODE_RESULT, the keys of message will show in the KeyList of action.
        Parameters:
        QRCode - The result string of scanning strip bottle

      • sendCode

        public void sendCode(java.lang.String QRCode,
                     int stripType,
                     int measureType)
        Send code to bg1 device
        • The action of the callback is Bg1Profile.ACTION_BG1_SENDCODE_RESULT, the keys of message will show in the KeyList of action.
        Parameters:
        QRCode - The result string of scanning strip bottle
        stripType - 1,GOD 2,GDH
        measureType - 1,Blood 2,CTL

        Close the communication
